library.description: abaaso is an enterprise class, light weight, RESTful JavaScript framework that provides a set of classes and object prototyping to ease the creation and maintenance of pure JavaScript applications.
library.name: abaaso

library.description: Ultra-fast implementation of reactivity for javascript
library.name: cellx

library.description: RxJS or Reactive Extensions for JavaScript is a library for transforming, composing, and querying streams of data. We mean all kinds of data too, from simple arrays of values, to series of events (unfortunate or otherwise), to complex flows of data.
library.name: RxJS

library.description: Paperclip is a simple, yet powerful reactive template engine built for speed, and extensibility.  It works by compiling templates to document fragments, then clones them whenever they're needed. The result is blazing-fast rendering with very few moving parts.
library.name: PaperclipJS

library.description: The object-observer pattern in javascript. Listen to changes that happen on your deep objects and arrays.
library.name: observe

library.description: Reactor is a lightweight library for reactive programming. It provides reactive variables which automatically update themselves when the things they depend on change. This is similar to how a spreadsheet works, where cells can automatically change their own values in reaction to changes in other cells.
library.name: Reactor.js

library.description: Reactive.js is a pure Javascript library inspired by Functional Reactive Programming.
library.name: Reactive.js

library.description: A reactive frontend framework for JavaScript.
library.name: Cyclow

library.description: Functional Reactive Programming library for Javascript. Improves your event-driven and asynchronous Javascript code by removing all mutable state from application code and separating pure code from side-effects.
library.name: Bacon.js

library.description:
Unobtrusive library to create reactive data structures and self-updating view functions

Mobservable ensures that all the changes in your data structures are propagated automatically, atomically and synchronously to all view functions that use your data. Mobservable also ships with a React mixin to create components that automatically refresh themselves.
library.name: mobservable
